attributes.action: Re-consider the effects of increased VED on older cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This needs to be thought through properly.This increase will reduce the number of second hand vehicles sold via dealers.This will then lead to a loss of V.A.T.payments as all dealers have to pay an amount of V.A.T.either on the sale price or on the profit margin of the vehicle.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
